short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome extension to reopen recently closed tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline Your Browsing with Recently Closed Tabs

Are you constantly reopening numerous tabs just to find the one you closed? Simplify your browsing experience with Recently Closed Tabs! This powerful tool is designed to streamline your workflow by providing an intuitive list of your recently closed tabs, allowing you to quickly locate, search, and reopen them without hassle.

Key Features:

-Instant Access to Closed Tabs: View a convenient list of your most recently closed tabs, ensuring you can easily find the one you need.

-Efficient Tab Search: Utilize the integrated search function to quickly locate specific tabs from your recent history.

-User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean and intuitive design that seamlessly integrates with your browser for a smooth user experience.

-Time-Saving Solution: Save valuable time by eliminating the need to repeatedly reopen recently closed tabs to find the right one.


Recently Closed Tabs is the ultimate tool for enhancing your browsing efficiency. Whether youâ€™re working on a project, researching, or just browsing the web, this extension ensures you have quick and easy access to your recently closed tabs. Download now and take control of your browsing history!
